welcome_body: Located in the heart of Damak, Oxford English School has been a beacon of quality education since 2055 B.S. We are committed to providing a holistic learning environment that fosters academic excellence, creativity, and moral values.
feature_desc_1: Our faculty consists of highly qualified and dedicated professionals.
feature_desc_2: Integrating modern technology to enhance the learning experience.
feature_desc_3: A wide range of activities for balanced development.
event_1_short_desc: Watch our students showcase their oratory skills in the grand finale of the Annual Speech Competition.
event_1_details: The Annual Speech Competition is a cornerstone of our co-curricular program, designed to boost confidence and public speaking skills. The grand finale features the best speakers across all primary and secondary sections, judged by renowned orators and educators.
event_2_short_desc: Watch our students showcase their sports performance to enhance their physical growth also.
event_2_details: The biggest sports event of the year! Students compete fiercely for house pride across various track, field, and team events. This day emphasizes physical fitness, teamwork, and healthy competition.
event_3_short_desc: A display of the innovative projects and creative masterpieces by our talented students.
event_3_details: A fusion of creativity and logic! Students present their innovative projects, experiments, and artistic masterpieces, demonstrating their academic and creative understanding across subjects.
past_event_1_short_desc: A spectacular evening of music, dance, and drama celebrating our school's foundation day.
past_event_1_details: The highlight of the academic year! Our annual function celebrated the school's achievements with dazzling performances, recognizing academic toppers and honoring distinguished alumni.
past_event_2_short_desc: An exciting day of friendly competition, teamwork, and athletic achievements on the field.
past_event_2_details: The early season sports meet, featuring thrilling relay races, obstacle courses, and a demonstration of discipline and sportsmanship by all houses. A successful event filled with energy!
about_history_body_1: Established in 2055 B.S., Oxford English School started with a humble vision: to provide exceptional, accessible education to the children of Damak. Over the decades, we have grown into a premier institution, known for our academic rigor and commitment to student development.
about_history_body_2: We believe in a balanced approach to education, blending traditional values with modern teaching methodologies to prepare our students for the challenges of the 21st century.
mission_body: To empower students with the knowledge, skills, and values needed to thrive in a global community. We aim to foster critical thinking, creativity, and a lifelong passion for learning in a safe and supportive environment.
vision_body: To be a leading educational institution in Nepal, recognized for academic excellence, innovative teaching, and the holistic development of every student, preparing them to be responsible and compassionate global citizens.
feature_expert_faculty_desc: Our dedicated teachers are experts in their fields, committed to nurturing each student's potential.
feature_digital_desc: We utilize smart boards and digital resources to create an interactive and engaging learning atmosphere.
feature_labs_desc: Fully-equipped physics, chemistry, and biology labs for hands-on practical learning & research.
feature_library_desc: A vast collection of books, journals, and digital media to support research and reading.
feature_transport_desc: Safe and reliable bus services covering various routes across the city and surrounding areas.
feature_sports_desc: Ample opportunities for students to excel in sports and other extracurricular activities.
fees_intro_para: We are committed to providing a transparent and fair fee structure. Our fees are structured in accordance with the guidelines set by educational authorities in Nepal.
fees_note_annual: * The Annual Fee includes charges for library, first-aid, science lab, computer lab, and examinations.
fees_note_admission: * Admission Fees are non-refundable. Please contact the accounts office for a detailed breakdown.
other_fee_transport_desc: Optional bus service is available. Fees vary based on the route and distance.
other_fee_uniform_desc: Available for purchase from the school's designated counter before the session begins.
other_fee_canteen_desc: Hygienic day-time meals are available at the canteen. This is an optional service.
payment_rule_1: All monthly fees must be paid within the **10th of each Nepali month**.
payment_rule_2: A late fee will be applicable for payments made after the due date.
payment_rule_3: Payments can be made directly at the school's Account Section or via Bank/eSewa.
payment_rule_4: Please retain all payment receipts for your records.
admission_info_intro: We welcome applications from students for classes Playgroup to Class X. Our admission process is designed to be transparent and straightforward.
step_1: Fill out the online inquiry form (below, sent via WhatsApp).
step_2: Visit the school to collect the admission packet.
step_3: Submit the completed application form with documents.
step_4: Appear for a small entrance test (for Class I and above).
step_5: Interview with the student and parents.
step_6: Confirmation of admission and fee payment.
bus_page_title: School Bus Services | Oxford English School
bus_intro_para: Oxford English School provides safe, reliable, and convenient transportation services for students residing within the Damak and surrounding areas. Our fleet is equipped with G.P.S tracking and monitored by staff.
route_c_areas: (Dakini - Aamda chowk - Mama chowk - Damak Area)
bus_note: * Fees are charged per month for a round trip (morning and afternoon). Exact fee determined based on distance from the school.
contact_info_para: We are always here to help. Feel free to reach out to us with any questions or for more information about our school.
gallery_intro_para: A glimpse into our vibrant school life, events, and facilities.
